nodes.text: Rifi was a type of sport fishing on Dorumaa.

Republic Commando: True Colors mentions the activity of "rifi fishing" once (page 225), but it is not made clear whether this refers to fishing for a type of fish known as a rifi (à la "bass fishing"), using a fishing style known as rifi fishing (à la "fly fishing"), or fishing in a location identified by the term rifi (à la "reef fishing").
